creditline: Gift of Gabriel and Yvonne Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: image of a dancing woman wearing a head scarf with blue and white stripes on a gold colored pattern; figure wearing green earrings and green necklace; dress has black sleeves with a blue bodice with gold polka dots; transparent skirt with blue stripes; green and gold ankle bracelets and blue shoes
medium: Black ink and watercolor on cream wove paper
provenance: '[Galerie Wietz Dominque, Paris, until 1995, to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Gabe and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
signed: Lower left, in black ink: Danseuse Orientale
title: Danseuse Orientale (Dancer in Orientalist Costume)
